name: SimuLatte - A VR Cafe Tech Demo (Q/Q2 & PCVR)
name_original: SimuLatte - A VR Cafe Tech Demo (Q/Q2 & PCVR)
description:
A small VR cafe game demo where you serve customers various drinks and baked goods.

They will not yell at you. They will not be short with you. They will wait forever for their request. They will wait one at a time.

Please, enjoy being behind the counter, instead of suffering it! This was made for coffee lovers. Have a nice day, and thank you very much for visiting! Please let me know if any bugs occur and I'll stomp them flat.
